Name: SisterFight
About the game: Control an orc and have your way with a sister of the faith in this 2D fighting game style action mini game. (Created with Unity + Spine) The controls are simple. Cursor keys only! Left Right Up Down Double Tap Up Double Tap Down For movement, body fondling, air borne slime and aphrodisiac mist! Defeat the sister and have your way with her. She may resist at first, but the more she cums... the more she succumbs! 12 x erotic animations in total! (2 x normal / 2 x special / 8 x grappling attacks) Each of them have speed changing, cumming and orgasm patterns! Also included is a butt naked mode! The objective of the game? To 'play' with a sister of the faith of course! Nothing more, nothing less. She may attack but Orc man is strong! Grahw! At the same time, Orc man is a gentleman. No women killing here! * Voiced with sound effects and BGM. CV: Ao Inukai Illustration: Sawati Animation: CatBellUnion Planning / Production: KooooN Soft
